value:
$WmMPID_リリーナ,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|Father...what's that swirly storm?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|Fret not, young lady! With me by
your side, there's nothing to fear!$k$p$WmMPID_リリーナ,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|Umm... Who are you again?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|Ah! Well, since you've asked so
nicely, allow me to tell you...$k$pI am the beautiful Princess—$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|Princess L'Arachel, right?
Haven't we crossed paths?
At...another festival, no less?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|Oh, er... Yes, I suppose we did,
didn't we...$k$p(But...my signature introduction...)$k$pAHEM! It must be that the gods
themselves, in their divine wisdom,
have reunited us before this vortex!$k$pCome, blessed Heroes! Let us go
forth and inspire all future bards
with the tales of our exploits!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドズラ,ch08_13_Dozzla_M_Halloween19,Face|Gwah ha ha! Spoken well, as always,
Princess L'Arachel!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|My dear mother and father nobly
gave their lives in the struggle against
the wicked.$k$pIf I am to fight, I shall fight like they
did—eyes ever forward and head
held high!$k$p$WmMPID_リリーナ,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|But enough prattle! We must
advance! Forward, gallant Heroes!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドズラ,ch08_13_Dozzla_M_Halloween19,Face|I am but yer humble servant...
I hear and obey... Gwah ha ha!
I've been waitin' for the order!$k$p$WmMPID_リリーナ,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|Oh! Umm... Wait...$k$pFather... I think they went the
wrong way...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヘクトル|Yes... I think you're right...$k$pI'm not sure where they're going
to end up, but it seems we're along
for the ride... Let's go, Lilina.$k$p

$WmMPID_比翼ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|Oho! That was a tough one!
Everyone still with us?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|We are—thanks to you! I was sure
I felt the clammy hand of death on
me for an instant...$k$pAnd while I am happy to yet walk
amongst the living, you should not
have risked yourself so for me.$k$pYou have a daughter to think of,
after all. For her sake, your safety
is of utmost importance!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|Hmm... I suppose I can't argue
with that...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|...Hm.$k$pSo you are the same, after all...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|What's that, now?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|You are just like my father... He, too,
was willing to risk everything for
his people and his world.$k$pYou are the same. I can see it in your
eyes. I knew the moment I saw them.
How could I forget those eyes?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|It was said that Father fought for
his people... He was a hero to the
common folk in truest sense.$k$pAnd in return, they praised him.
A man of honor... A man of justice...
A man of righteousness...$k$pBut...an end is an end, regardless of
the glory. No amount of praise could
bring him back to me.$k$p$WmMPID_リリーナ,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|A daughter's wish, as her father's
child, is always for her father to
remain healthy and strong.$k$pThat is why...I have something
important I must ask of you...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|I understand, milady.$k$pAllow me to offer this oath: I swear
to survive. For Lilina's sake, and
for yours.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|Ah! Beautiful! Now, in light of that,
we must prepare to meet the future
head-on—whatever it holds for us!$k$pAnd there's no better time than the
present! Time to train until our
muscles burn! ...Follow me!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドズラ,ch08_13_Dozzla_M_Halloween19,Face|Gwah ha ha! Now yer talkin'! I'm
right behind ya!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|Hm. She's got a knack for getting
what she wants out of her troops,
doesn't she?$k$p...But I think we've had enough for
today, haven't we? Let's go, Lilina.$k$p$nMPID_リリーナ|Yes, Father.$k$p
